alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 13 at 1:47PM CDT until April 14 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN OKLAHOMA AND TEXAS PANHANDLES... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Beaver. In Texas...Ochiltree... Lipscomb...Roberts...Hemphill...Carson...Gray...Wheeler... Armstrong...Donley and Collingsworth. * 20 Foot Winds...West southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35.0 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...2 to 5. * Timing...Friday, 12 PM through 9 PM CDT.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
